extension.title: Syntax Highlighter 2.0
extension.label: Syntax
extension.description: This extension contains functions for highlighting syntax of popular programming languages.

config.param: Select color theme for highlighted text. (one of 'Default', 'Django', 'Eclipse', 'Emacs', 'FadeToGrey', 'Midnight', or 'RDark')

function.name: format
function.description: Show code using specified syntax formatter.
function.param: source code to highlight
Allows you to force highlighted elements on the page to be collapsed by default.
Allows you to change the first (starting) line number.
Allows you to turn gutter with line numbers on and off.
Allows you to show column ruler on top of highlighted elements.
Toggles toolbar on/off.
Allows you to turn line wrapping feature on and off.
Select color theme for highlighted text. (one of 'Default', 'Django', 'Eclipse', 'Emacs', 'FadeToGrey', 'Midnight', or 'RDark'; default: see config)
Select highlighting brush.

pre.eval:class: 'brush: $brush; collapse: $collapse; first-line: $firstline; gutter: $gutter; ruler: $ruler; toolbar: $toolbar; wrap-lines: $wrap; ' % { brush: string.tolower($brush), collapse: $collapse ? 'true' : 'false', firstline: $firstline, gutter: $gutter ? 'true' : 'false', ruler: $ruler ? 'true' : 'false', toolbar: $toolbar ? 'true' : 'false', wrap: $wrap ? 'true' : 'false' }
